formalpara.title: Movie 3: QL.x migration.
formalpara.para: Movie starts with QL.a and QL.p positioned above seam cell V5. QL.a migrates over QL.p towards the posterior. QL.p migrates a small distance and remains close to seam cell V5. In the final frame a metaphase plate appears in QL.a indicating the beginning of the second Q cell division. During the movie, seam cell V5 divides as well. Markers as in Movie 1. Ten min time intervals shown at 1 frame/s, dorsal is up, anterior is left.
